config.title: Header Style 30

variables.menu_drop_font: 400 12px/1.35 Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.menu_font: 500 14px/1.35 Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.vermenu_font: 500 12px/1.35 Roboto, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif

config.layout_xml:
<body> <referenceContainer name="header.container" htmlClass="page-header header-style-30" /> <referenceContainer name="header-container-inner"> <container name="header-top" htmlId="header-top" before="-" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-top" /> </referenceContainer> <referenceContainer name="header.panel"> <container name="header-panel-row" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-row row no-margin flex-center" after="skip_to_content"> <container name="header-panel-left" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-7 col-md-5 header-panel-left no-padding" /> <container name="header-panel-right" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-17 col-md-19 header-panel-right no-padding"> <container name="hp-right-top" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="hp-right-top flex-center clearfix"> <container name="hp-top-left" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="hp-top-left" /> <container name="hp-top-right" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="hp-top-right flex-center" /> </container> <container name="hp-right-bottom" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="hp-right-bottom flex-center clearfix" > <container name="hp-bottom-left" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="hp-bottom-left" /> <container name="hp-bottom-right" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="hp-bottom-right" /> </container> </container> </container> </referenceContainer> <move element="header.panel" destination="header-top" />
<move element="mobi-cart-placeholder" destination="hp-top-right" /> <move element="top.search" destination="hp-top-right" before="-" /> <move element="minicart" destination="hp-top-right" after="-" /> <move element="logo" destination="header-panel-left" /> <move element="top.links.features" destination="hp-top-right" before="minicart" />
<referenceBlock name="wish-list-link-features" remove="true" /> <referenceBlock name="header-contact-link" remove="true" /> <referenceBlock name="top.links"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">css_class</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">header links visible-xs</argument> </action> </referenceBlock> <referenceContainer name="hp-top-left" > <block name="header-extra-text-1" class="Codazon\ThemeLayoutPro\Block\Header" template="Codazon_ThemeLayoutPro::layout/header-content.phtml"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">content_type</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">content_1</argument> </action> </block> </referenceContainer> <referenceContainer name="hp-bottom-left"> <block name="header-extra-text-2" class="Codazon\ThemeLayoutPro\Block\Header" template="Codazon_ThemeLayoutPro::layout/header-content.phtml"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">content_type</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">content_2</argument> </action> </block> </referenceContainer>
<move element="catalog.topnav" destination="hp-bottom-right" before="-" />
<move element="store-menu-placeholder" destination="store.menu" /> </body>
config.content: {"content_1":"<div class=\"store-info-top\">\r\n<div class=\"social-wrap\"><a class=\"spin circle\" href=\"#\"><span class=\"fa fa-facebook\">facebook<\/span><\/a> <a href=\"#\"><span class=\"fa fa-twitter\">twitter<\/span><\/a> <a href=\"#\"><span class=\"fa fa-pinterest-p\">pinterest<\/span><\/a> <a href=\"#\"><span class=\"fa fa-google-plus\">google plus<\/span><\/a> <a href=\"#\"><span class=\"fa fa-rss\">rss<\/span><\/a><\/div>\r\n<\/div>","content_2":"<div class=\"header-contact\"><span class=\"msg-text\">Call us: <\/span><a class=\"icon-link\" href=\"tel:456 789 xxx\"> (456) 789 5xxx<\/a><\/div>"}
